lender.name: Klaus & Shelley
lender.occupation: Public policy for Klaus and health care for Shelle
lender.loan_because: as small business owners ourselves (Shelley's dietetic practice), we understand the importance of access to capital and other resources to get started. We want fellow entrepreneurs to have fewer sleepless nights!!
lender.occupational_info: Klaus works for a nonprofit that offers innovative solutions to public health challenges.. Shelley improves the health for patients who seek help with nutrition concerns.

lender.name: Kerrie
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I work at advertising clothing products to the Canadian market.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: I wan't to help people who need help with their business, because it can change their life for the better.

lender.name: mia
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I like to give, and wish I had more to give. People need a chance to make do in life; life is not easy, and I am thankful for what I have. I hope all the Kiva folks succeed at their hard work.

lender.name: Shaingo
lender.loan_because: It's a joy to be able to help someone who is struggling. Watching them get back on their feet and repay their loan is exciting and gratifying. I'm SO glad I can do it!
lender.occupational_info: I teach piano to children, I teach massage therapy to adults.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I should.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and especially to those who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: My parents, John and Elizabeth Sweeney, raised me to care about others. My Dad died 11 years ago but a little bit of him lives on when I am able to loan.
lender.occupational_info: My work is a combination of biomedical research and teaching at a UC Medical School.

lender.name: Maria and her boys
lender.loan_because: I want my boys to learn that life is all about giving and not receiving. That there are hard working people out there that are not as fortunate as they are and that they can make a difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher in Portland, Oregon

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: If our country can bail out the wealthiest among us, then we should also help out the neediest. Eat the rich!!
lender.occupational_info: Communications consulting for non-profits and foundations

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: in a fair world everyone will have access to credit at the level appropriate for them and their circumstances. I looked for a "kiva" for a long time and have now been validated so well by all my co-lenders. I am amazed and gratified by what I see here every day.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to live more fully and easily in this world. I take care of two incredible kids and a few older ladies. I live for my work and my 23-year-old daughter follows my chosen path with her own degree in massage therapy.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: We are all connected. I want to help other people and make a positive impact in the world.

lender.name: Sooz
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to have the resources to be the giver while remembering a time when I was the receiver. But for the generosity of people willing to offer me financial assistance when I desperately needed it to provide for family, I would not now be enjoying prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I assist lawyers in the practice of labor and employment law.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others. I know what it is like to live in difficult times....I want to give hope and encouragement to others. To let others know that we are all connected and WE CARE!
lender.occupational_info: Health care clinic. I am a medical photographer taking pictures of the inside of your body.

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: ...it's a great way to make a difference and help those in need! So many of us are so fortunate. It's a gift to be able to give.

lender.name: Aleeza
lender.loan_because: The ability to fund these loans to entrepreneurs around the world is so meaningful. I can't think of a better way to impact the world and fight global poverty.

lender.name: michele
lender.loan_because: it feels so good to be able to do something for someone and see the benefit. I love to see all the different places and people and show my children that it doesn't take much to change someone's life.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I remind myself in America we are conditioned by the media and advertising giants to "want" and we confuse that with what we "need". Since loaning on Kiva only twice I rethink everytime I walk into a store and consider what I "want" to buy and what others "need". We all can change the world by very simple gestures and that choice is a blessing.

lender.name: Tracy & EG
lender.loan_because: We are finally in the position to "give back" and want to help others succeed and then they too can pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Make people's homes feel and look nice, comfortable and inviting to come home to.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want my children to learn the importance of helping others
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom that is raising 3 young children.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.occupation: Former Teacher, current Esthetician, and mom to be
lender.loan_because: My mom gave me a gift certificate to Kiva !
lender.occupational_info:
About to be a mother of 2 !!!!!!
TWIN girls !!!!

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who want to work and make a better life for themselves and their family. I enjoy being able to give back to people and help them enjoy a better life!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Casino Industry in Las Vegas and I take care of people from all around the world.

lender.name: DEEDEE
lender.loan_because: Selfish reasons really, it feels good to help others help themselves...
lender.occupational_info: Joyous

lender.name: Jessi
lender.loan_because: The thought of helping someone without grand resources warms my heart and motivates me to make a positive impact. Mother Teresa said " If you cannot feed a country, feed just one".
lender.occupational_info: I work in the sports medicine field and help an Orthopedic Surgeon (A doctor that specializes in musculoskeletal injuries) evaluate, diagnose, operate, and run his clinic smoothly.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: A little bit can help a lot, and since they pay you back it doesn't even cost anything!

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupation: glass and jewelry artist and teacher

lender.name: Magali and Friends
lender.loan_because: I have so many toys already and some kids don't have any money to eat and buy clothes.

lender.name: Jai-Jagdeesh
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Joyous. Healthy. Grateful.

lender.name: Dionne & Bruce
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to ride and communicate with horses.

lender.name: lilah
lender.loan_because: positive change starts from the ground up.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: We can all make a difference.

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone improve his/her life.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and do as much volunteer work as I can.

lender.name: Marie
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from a large US corporation where I worked for over 30 years. My last position was as chief operating officer of an investment management subsidiary - where I was responsible for everything but the investing. Over the years I was in many areas of marketing and finance.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I am donating in memory of friends and family who have passed away, Doris, Eva, Linda, Dick, Bonny, Karen

lender.name: Billie and David
lender.loan_because:
We're not passengers on Spaceship Earth...
we're the crew.
lender.occupational_info: We help individuals with difficulties in both the physical and emotional aspects of their lives.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: We usually don't get back what was lend out but thru this Kiva program does -- 97% vs (3%). Where else in the world can a poor person apply for a small capital loan or ...? Not even in the U.S. In case u fall into the low (3%) consider as CONTRIBUTION for a well cause. Kiva's lending program is allowing me to lend a "helping hand" within my limits. So far all loans have been paid back -great news.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can
lender.occupational_info: I help large companies to develop its business plans

lender.name: Carl J. Cogswell
lender.loan_because: Everyone wants to acheive.

lender.name: DOROTA
lender.loan_because: I CARE
lender.occupational_info: WORK WITH CHILDREN

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: This is amazing!
lender.occupational_info: Conceptual video artist, filmmaker.

lender.name: Tonya
lender.loan_because: With a little help, many people can change their lives ... I am happy to be part of that help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the largest newspaper in the United States.

lender.name: Kerrie
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist. I work for a supermarket chain.I am a supervisor of myself,of course, and three other very talented women.We draw on chalkboards,murals,etc. for the company's 45 stores advertising what the stores offer, sales, etc. I love it very much and consider myself very blessed! My husband is an auctioneer and owns his own business and has been very successful,like I said earlier we are very thankful and blessed!

lender.name: Gabriela
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university and I conduct research. I am an historian and I love my job.

lender.name: Justin & Krystle
lender.loan_because: it changes lives. We are so lucky to be live in such a privileged country and this is one way to give back and help others who don't get the advantages we get. It's amazing to see how this can be a start for someone or an opportunity to expand his or her business. We can all give up a little to change these people's lives.

lender.name: Patricia Ferguson
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy when women rise out of poverty, through hard work.
lender.occupational_info: Retired teacher turned quilt artist. Passionate about Borzoi in art and quilts.

lender.name: Ramya
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage the entrepreneurial spirit! I have always admired those who take risks instead of settling for what is handed to them. Money not invested is a waste. What's better than investing in those who invest in themselves? I prefer that to just accruing more money.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: you should have access to the money you need. I am lucky enough to be able to help. Best wishes from my family and me.
lender.occupational_info: I run a service business in Canada.

lender.name: Ix.
lender.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give someone a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: Have been in marketing and sales, a college registrar, in corporate admin. and then caretaking my 92 year old father, who recently passed away (11/08). Planning to move from FL back to the West, not sure if it will be AZ, OR, or WA

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: Jesus has blessed me generously, so I want to be a blessing to someone else. "Pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I tend to about 12 horses on my horse farm daily, plus I hold horse shows on and off of my farm monthly where riders compete. I also judge horse shows.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: It's good way to feel connected to people around the world and support entrepreneurs

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: it's simply a good idea to participate and make a positive impact.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a marketing manager in high technology. I market software to customers in the US, Japan and Europe.

lender.name: morgan
lender.loan_because: it feels good

lender.name: Dayami and David
lender.loan_because: every person matters and can make a difference !

lender.name: Amy in honor of Grandma
lender.loan_because: I want to help spread the wealth and encourage hope.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze business financial statements and loan requests to help determine if a business should get a loan.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I love to help others in a positive manner. By loaning money to someone to help them run a business enables them to improve their situation for the long term not just short term.
lender.occupational_info: I work on large corporate projects. I am mainly in charge of keeping the project on schedule.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I IMAGINE a world of all people living in PEACE.
lender.occupational_info: Hello! I was a concrete delivery driver. I had a spinal stroke and cannot work any more.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: Many of us will at some point in life need help from a stranger, a friend we yet have to meet. I have had that opportunity and now want to return the favor to somebody else. It's all about Karma and being part of the solution.
lender.occupational_info: I am self employed and work most days of the week. I walk dogs and take care of people's pets. It's a small business run by me, alone. I understand the hardship of trying to make it another day... but I still keep an open mind and giving heart.

lender.name: Mary and Peter
lender.occupation: Director of Domestic Affairs & Project Manager

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: We are all one.
lender.occupational_info: Our agency helps individuals with disabilities, such as autism, mental retardation, cerebral palsy, and epilepsy by following their lives closely and assisting them in finding the supports they may need.

lender.name: Maryann & Amanda
lender.loan_because: we admire their work ethic and are inspired by their determination
lender.occupational_info: front office assistant in a pediatric clinic high school jr.

lender.name: Carlton
lender.loan_because: YAH has blessed me with so much. Helping others is my way of sharing his blessings. Plus, it gives me joy to know that I have helped someone to make their lives better
lender.occupational_info: Providing IT services to hotels across the globe.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I love this idea that I can help people without lessening the accomplishment of building their own businesses and improving their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I look for new ways to make computers help us solve problems.

lender.name: DARRYL
lender.loan_because: We all should take care of one another. Only then! this place we all call home would truly be a paradise.
lender.occupational_info: i produce very creative images that tell ones story on television and over the internet.

lender.name: john j
lender.loan_because: It's a privilege to be able to contribute to this wonderful project.

lender.name: Dominique
lender.loan_because: we are interdependant
lender.occupational_info: fraternity

lender.name: Tanja Barnes
lender.loan_because: I know the challenges of running your own business.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to people through my hands and try to touch their lives in a positive way.

lender.name: NickandMom
lender.loan_because: Yesterday, my two year old took time out of his schedule to help a lady pick up her tomatoes. When she said, thank you...he gave her a thumbs up! I loan because my son is very giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Nurse...I take care of all that need me.

lender.name: francesca
lender.loan_because: being lucky by having everyhthing we need for a good life, I believe it is important to give someone else the chance to get a better life

lender.name: Eileen
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Neonatal Intensive Care unit taking care of premature and sick infants.

lender.name: April and Chris
lender.loan_because: We want to help.

lender.name: Ren
lender.occupational_info: Software development services

lender.name: HELEN
lender.loan_because: I BELIEVE THAT EVERYONE CAN USE A HELPING HAND SOMETIME IN LIFE/WHETHER IT BE MONEY OR TIME - THIS TIME IT IS MONEY
lender.occupational_info: I WRITE FOR AN ANTIQUES TRADE PUBLICATION AND ALSO SELL ANTIQUES

lender.name: Gary Cottreau
lender.loan_because:
I like the idea of these loans because I can help out and make a difference. What is cool about this is the loan will be put to good use and I have a little say in where it goes.
Also, the loan is a hand-up and not a hand-out. It can be reused once the loan is repaid and help another family. If I can help the parents with providing for a business, this will help their family members too with the income earned.
Like all economies - this will trickle down to the rest of the community during day-to-day transactions when purchasing supplies and buying daily needs.
lender.occupational_info: I help protect the intellectual property of large corporations by registering and modifying domains in many countries around the world. Each country has their own domain extension - a list is at http://www.iana.org/root-whois/index.html

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help people in other parts of the world to make a success of their business ventures.
lender.occupational_info: I organise the payment of employees salaries.

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: I believe that the big financial institutions and governments across the globe often ignore -or just don't see profits- in the informal economies of the developing world. However informal, these economies across the world are a substantial economic engine for lifting people out of poverty. Microlending allows people to raise above the cycle of poverty towards self-sufficiency and growth.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the legal department of a large multinational company. I run the day to day activities of the department while the lawyers carry out the legal work.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a clinical research laboratory performing various micro and molecular biological tasks.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone else make their dreams come true, to empower them and to enrich their lives.
lender.occupational_info: difficult, sell advertising to the automotive industry in Florida.

lender.name: Sid
lender.loan_because: I believe we all can use a helping hand and my God has been good and merciful to me and I should be likewise to my fellow man.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a factory doing a variety of mechanical and electrical repairs.

lender.name: Matt and Karen
lender.loan_because: We love to travel and are happy to have a way to help develop some of the places we've visited. Also, it's a lot better than just donating the money.

lender.name: Jazuli
lender.loan_because: To give a privilege to the under privileged, InshaAllah
lender.occupational_info: Honest, hard working

lender.name: Dahlia
lender.loan_because: a change starts with you...

lender.name: Clay Barrantes
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someones life. I donate money to several organizations each year and Kiva has just been added as one of them.
lender.occupational_info: I am an LMT, NMT and work in Boston, MA, USA.

lender.name: tracy and michael
lender.loan_because: we have so much and think it is very important to help others.
lender.occupational_info: i'm a banker and my husband is a graphic designer.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I need help once and was given the opportunity; therefore, I must pass on the act of kindness to help!
lender.occupational_info: I choose a noble field - Medicine- which brings such a joy by helping others.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: We believe that if someone has a dream they should try to fulfill it and if we can help that person achieve that dream or vision by a monetary loan then we are all for it.
lender.occupational_info: Rob helps customers understand the value of our database platform. He also writes technical books.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: I saw this on TV and realized that helping other people provide for their families was a better way to use my money than blowing it on things we don't need. My husband and I are blessed to have good jobs and enough money to provide for our family (even though we struggle sometimes) and I love the idea that I am helping others to achieve the same blessing. I believe that these men and women are working hard to improve their lives and I am happy to contribute to that!
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading and writing skills to 12 year old children. I love my job. My husband services air conditioners and heaters.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: To give back what I have been fortunate to earn.
lender.occupational_info: My firm helps corporations educate their employees to provide customers an excellent interaction.

lender.name: Mohit
lender.loan_because: its a wonderful thing to do.

lender.name: Happy Moose
lender.loan_because: I am lucky and like to help others.

lender.name: Team Spiers
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Bat Benevolence
lender.occupational_info:
The plants and animals that live around us have stories. I like to learn those stories and share them with people of all ages.
I also write, draw, play music, free-lance graphic design, and design web sites.

lender.name: Scott and Kara
lender.loan_because: While we don't have a lot of spare money to donate to charity, the money we do have really makes a difference to the business owners that we loan to. Plus, we like the personal connection that you get through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: My husband owns his own business doing systems engineering consulting work. I stay home with our two beautiful children; I was previously employed as a software engineer.

lender.name: Lise
lender.loan_because: I loan because it's the right thing to do. It's great to be able to lend a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work in market research.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I feel I'm very blessed with a happy, healthy family. I feel if everyone would help someone in need, the world would be a much better place.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother of three , with a wonderful husband that provides for the family ,so I could be home to raise our children.

lender.name: connie
lender.loan_because: It is better to give then to recieve
lender.occupational_info: A drop of water in the ocean of life

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: I am an contractor and understand what that sometimes business persons need help and shouldn't have to play politics to get that help. I ENJOY helping others. I enjoy hearing about my 'friends' progress. I would like to see updates months after the loan has been completed.
lender.occupational_info: I contract with a company to deliver trailers to dealerships around the US and Canada.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: We have been very fortunate to have a great support system and wanted to be able to provide support to others across the globe.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I am the Director of Manufacturing for a Wood and Wood Products Company. Our manufacturing includes products for the door and window industries.

lender.name: Robert Barbie James Ellie Emma Jesse
Durwood
lender.loan_because: I don't have a lot, but I have enough and more. My simple life is embarrassingly comfortable, when compared to most people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I have seen what a big impact such small loans can have for entrepreneurs and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Management Officer at U.S. Embassies

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: it is often the little things in live that can make the most profound difference

lender.name: Aimee and Anne
lender.loan_because: To make the world a better place for all and to do our part to contribute to the greater good.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people and building gardens

lender.name: Darryl
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I use technology to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: What little I can do can help others around the world, more people need to give.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I want to try to make the world a better place!

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: It brings a smile to my heart to play a small part in encouraging and supporting other entreprenerial spirits, while at the same time feeling like we're erasing borders that segregate land into countries, but rather supporting one world under one God.
lender.occupational_info: I have always been happiest doing my own thing, having my own business, working from my home. I've been a gift basket designer, designed lawn signs to announce babies, written romance novels, and now, for an income, I am taking other peoples' dogs into our home while they are on vacation so that they don't have to put their beloved pets in a kennel.

lender.name: Sherman
lender.loan_because: I feel GIVING will help develope my businesses during the off season, because my work is seasonal, so I have to create other thing to do when the season is slow...call 1-888-834-9865 or 1-800-507-7222 code#CL3939
lender.occupational_info: I work for AFL-CIO Union 835 Orlando, Florida which brings in ALL CONVENTIONS into the Orlando Orange County Convention Center, and hotels like the Walt Disney World Swan and Dolpin. I help lay the carpet, build the booths, and take the CONVENTION SHOWS down when the SHOWS are over!

lender.name: Galit
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My work requires me to spend most of my time sitting in front of a computer. Since I am a consultant, I am at a different business every day and some days I work at my home office.

lender.name: Amanda and Marc
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help make a difference... even if it's just one baby step at a time.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate in my life and want to share with others who may not have the same opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major petrochemical company as an analyst.

lender.name: LouAnn
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with 3 to 5 year old children in a public school preschool program. My job is to help these kids develop speech and language skills. In other words I'm a Speech Language Pathologist

lender.name: Robin Locke Monda
lender.loan_because: It is a form that allows for perpetual giving, within a limited budget.
lender.occupational_info: I help people communicate better, by making their web pages, their advertising and their books attractive and easy to understand.

lender.name: Tom and Glenda
lender.loan_because: this is an excellent way to help people to become self-sufficieint.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world by helping people who want to work get the opportunity to build towards their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I'm an office worker who helps manage medical programs for the U.S. Air Force

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I think it's great people are not regarded as just victims. And I also think it's great to be a bussinesspartner!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneuring can be fun, profitable and a way to succeed in life.

lender.name: Fred
lender.occupational_info: Firefighter/Paramedic

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It is more blessed to give than to receive

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance. Helping out hardworking, honest entrepreneurs just makes sense and is my way of giving somebody an opportunity to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: My work allows me travel and see other cultures, people and places. Those lessons are far more rewarding than my actual job.

lender.name: barb
lender.loan_because: i believe in assisting people to become self-sufficient and an important part in enhancing their community
lender.occupational_info: factory worker

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: A way to help a larger global community.
lender.occupational_info: Education and exploration

lender.name: Kathy & Kids
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance, and if what little i can lend will help someone then it was all worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I am the proud mother of 3 awesome kids! I look forward to helping a many Kiva persons as possible.

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: I have been helped to suceed through the gifts and loans of others, so I know it works!
lender.occupational_info: I manage the day to day operations of an A/C company by scheduling, billing, recording information and finding solutions to problems.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I've been very poor, and have been blessed to in a position to be able to help others. I feel this is a wonderful way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I draw and paint pictures, and make beads with glass and a propane torch.

lender.name: Rochlani Family
lender.loan_because: Life lived for others is life indeed; Life lived for self is a barren waste.
lender.occupational_info: I meet business people who have lots of work to do but very little time to do it. I understand their needs and then work with technical folks who program computers to get the same work done faster and better.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: It take a village,right. With Kiva,the world is our village.

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupational_info: I help musicians market their music and connect with their fans.

lender.name: The Burkhart's
lender.loan_because: Its very gratifying to give to others and know it will improve their life and that of their families.
lender.occupational_info: Dianne oversees the operations and lending departments of TLC Federal Credit Union. Carl works in distribution for NW Natural Gas. David & Aaron are college students.

lender.name: Jose Sola
lender.loan_because: where else can you do so much with so little?

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: not helping when you can is just the saddest statement you can make about yourself

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: I started a business without having capital and also under the cloud of a 2.5 yr. frivilous lawsuit by a competitor using the legal system to try and put me under. Hard work and ingenuity are only a leaping off point but funding is essential to a person's perserverence where ever that may come from. When it happens, the sun breaks through and your vision becomes crystalized. I loan because I wanted my reach to be more global and soon my own business will do just that.
lender.occupational_info:
The Eleanor Group is a spa & wellness marketing company that matches local people with local services through fundraising with schools & non-profits. We help day spas use their service dollars in place of their marketing dollars to effectively bring in more new local clientele. So those supporting the fundraiser get great discounted services, the spas get grateful new local people and get to support their community and the fundraising organization raises money quickly and easily.
Everyone wins!

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: It gives me an opportunity to help out women who want to better themselves and their living situation by creating their own business thus helping them build self-worth and pride in themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Take fire emergency calls in a dispatch centre and then dispatch the appropriate department and vehicles to the scene of the emergency.

lender.name: chastity
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great thing that I can do to make a difference for someone less fortunate than I with just a little bit of money.
lender.occupational_info: I drive to clients homes and professionally groom their pet right in their own home.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Supporting the dreams of others is just as important as following your own.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: It is my way of helping those who are trying to make something of themselves to accomplish that goal.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired I raised corn and soybeans on a farm in Illinois.

lender.name: Joe and Steve
lender.loan_because: It feels great knowing we're helping people who are helping themselves. Let's help open the doors http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Ti0qV5pbJM

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I understand that sometimes just a little can do so much.

lender.name: CINDY
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have the chance to support themselves, and this is an affordable way that I can do it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a customer service representative at a bank. I help people decide what kind of account they need and open it for them. If they have problems with their banking I help them find the solution.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I hope that those in need know that there are people who compassionately care for them. I'm beyond blessed, and I want to bless others with what I have.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a physician, hopefully to work with Latino populations either in the States or in Latin America, with an emphasis on preventive medicine. In addition to Mxico, I have lived in Asuncin, Paraguay, and Jinotega, Nicaragua, and have traveled throughout Latin America. These three countries and their people, however, are especially dear to my heart.

lender.name: Inguna
lender.occupational_info: I'm a New York based designer and I work mostly for web.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he can eat for a day, give a man a fishing rod.........

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are all one and that I can make a little difference in the world for someone then I am doing my part
lender.occupational_info: Growing plants for others to enjoy

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach four year old children. I teach early reading and writing, math skills, and social skills.

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: I believe the way to world peace is through giving everyone the chance to provide their families a good life .

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It' the right thing to do...

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to those in need in my global community. When I see all that I have it makes me want to share and change the lives of someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I have become medically disabled and so I have retired from my job of managing a 124 unit apartment community.

lender.name: shannon
lender.loan_because: I would like to help women in need who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with school aged children with disabilities to reach their potential and become independent, with academics, socially and emotionally.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: There are entrepreneurs all over the world and to have the ability to enable others is an opportunity not to be missed
lender.occupational_info: working with others to get the best out of their investments in technology (computers and related applications).

lender.name: Vera and Russ
lender.loan_because: I support micro economics because I feel that it is human nature to desire self sustenance and so many individuals in the world do not have the opportunity to experience this simply by virtue of circumstance.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: I want 100% of the money going to the individuals or community and not to sustaining or perpetuating corporate charities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with inner city students from cultures around the world. I provide opportunities for them to discover their talents beyond academics by integrating dance, drama and film making in to their educational experience.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Shera
lender.loan_because: I know first hand as a board member and volunteer of a non-profit organization here in New York that every little thing we can do makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: To earn a living I am in Human Resources but my passion is in the non-profit world. I work with a group of women who deliver a program called "Circle of Woman" to woman at risk recovering from homelessness, addiction and abuse.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that are trying hard to make a better life for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I design electronics communications systems.

lender.name: Nicole & Chad
lender.loan_because: It will give someone else a chance to provide for their family... Hard work should be rewarded...
lender.occupational_info: Chad is a self employed commercial fisherman who sells to fish houses in South Florida. Chad loves his job and is fortunate enough to make a good living doing what he loves. I was blessed enough to be able to go to law school and now love what I do.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being of service to others.
lender.occupational_info: I do gourd artwork as well as intuitive readings.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: God has richly blessed me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach High School English.

lender.name: maura
lender.loan_because: i believe in paying it forward

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great opportunity to help
lender.occupational_info: I Install sewer and water systems

lender.name: Lend-a-hand
lender.loan_because: My beer money can make a difference. Who knew?

lender.name: JULES45
lender.loan_because: Fifteen years ago I was a woman with a vision. Getting a financial institute to loan me money was impossible. I had no retail experience only a vision. I wanted to help as many dog and cat owners in my community to understand the benefits of feeding a better nutritionally sound diet to their four legged loved ones. My business is now very successful finacially and educationally. I want to share as much as I can to woman with their own visions. Empowering woman to move forward in business is healthy to any economy and I want to be a part of that. JULES

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and it makes me happy to lend a helping hand. The gift to me --which is really big--feeling less helpless about the state of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write children's books and I'm currently working on a suspense novel set in South Africa.

lender.name: rebecca
lender.loan_because: its a small world and we should help our neighbors when we can
lender.occupational_info: I assist people while they are learning to overcome their disease of addiction

lender.name: shirley
lender.loan_because: i have been fortunate in life and want to pay back, pay it forward, maybe make a fortunate difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: artwork that is very demanding, with specifications, process rules, and verification programs to be run and interpreted to produce a perfect product.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to have received a bank loan in1999 which enabled me and my businesss partner to open our picture frame shop and gallery in Holland, MI, USA. I wanted to help give someone else a chance to express their entrepreneurial spirit and to fulfill their dream for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a picture framing business and art gallery where I sell my own paintings and other artwork and prints.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a step above pure donation. Helping others help themselves is a much stronger proposition than donating to big-umbrella organizations.

lender.name: Dori
lender.loan_because: As a single mother, i have been blessed with a career and family reosurces that help support my daughter in all the important ways. My commitment here at Kiva is to support the hard work of other moms who wish to make the lives of their children productive, safe and happy.

lender.name: Marjorie
lender.loan_because: I feel a great method of helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a government worker.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I fly a plane.

lender.name: Manjit
lender.loan_because: I find it truly rewarding to empower others and help them realize their full potential.

lender.name: Vonda
lender.occupational_info: I run a non-profit that provides leadership training and development to youth ages 13-18.

lender.name: Kiley
lender.loan_because: It makes such a huge difference in people's lives. Helping people to help themselves is very rewarding.

lender.name: Canadian Warrants
lender.loan_because: I have had some really nice gains from trading warrants so donating all money collected from google ads now to the businesses on Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: A website for people to find all the information on warrants trading on the Canadian exchanges.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and would like to share my blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I help people walk through times in their lives that are a struggle for them.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I like to see what others can create with a little extra help. We all need a little extra help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies pay their employees - mostly in calculating how much taxes need to go to the government.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: It"s good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I sell medical goods.

lender.name: Merle
lender.loan_because: My wife Joanne and 10year old grandaughter Hannah feel it is important to help others
lender.occupational_info: I'm involved in the interior of classrooms ink-12 schools and very involved in school planning

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: It provides real economic stimulus and benefit to the borrowers and their communities. I can help people who who are helping themselves which is a core value for me, and I can make a meaningful impact in my borrowers lives.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help people throughout the world become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I am a straight A student.

lender.name: jon & christina
lender.loan_because: everyone that can, should

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: Jesus told me to.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: in following Mahatma Ghandi's wisdom, "Be the change you want to see in the world."

lender.name: Doug & Lonni
lender.loan_because: We recognize how fortunate we are to live in Canada and have the life we do. We're happy to have this opportunity to connect with others who need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: Doug is an airline pilot who flys to locations in Europe, Australia and Asia. I work in human resources.

lender.name: Gregg
lender.loan_because: I believe in trickle up economics not trickle down.
lender.occupational_info: I am the head geek for a worldwide rail maintenance company.

lender.name: Hoosier Helpers
lender.loan_because: We have decided to forego exchanging gifts and use that money to help others who may put it to better use.
lender.occupational_info: We are: a retail manager, laundry specialist, business owner(s),

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I have been on Mission trip to Nicaragua & have experienced how poor and in need of help the people there are.( I went with North country mission of hope ). They do have a web site.
lender.occupational_info: I loved going and having hands on to help out in Nicaragua. It was only a week but back home I help collect meds etc... to send for our next trips. Very rewarding!! My favorite was the orphanage !

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back to others, in appreciation for all that I have received in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I produce videos and live events, meetings and conferences. The corporate work pays for the many non-profit videos and events that I am honored to produce.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. There's nothing more rewarding than helping others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: In addition to being an adjunct college instructor, I work for a large corporation to help them purchase needed items.

lender.name: Della & Tim
lender.loan_because: We care.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: The people of my country take so much from the world, this is a wonderful opportunity to give a little back.
lender.occupational_info: I do diagnostic procedures of the lungs. I am also an antique dealer. But I do all this for my passion which is travel

lender.name: Mimi
lender.loan_because: I believe that all of us who have enjoyed the blessings of fulfilling lives should give back and extend the hope of future prosperity & success to others in need
lender.occupational_info: I worked with troubled children, homeless families, and young children with cancer, & diagnosed developmental, behavioral, and psychological disorders in children so that they could receive appropriate treatments

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want do what I can to give others the opportunities to live their dreams, or provide a future for their families.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: My life lesson: It is never too early to learn about our social responsibilities. My wish: May my actions lead to a better life for those around me and around the world My hope: That your spirit is lifted and your hope strenghtened My family: Everyone
lender.occupational_info: Most importantly, I want to be a good Christian & a good citizen of the world.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: it's important to give people a chance.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.occupation: Grandmother, Mother, Mother Inlaw, Aunt, Friend
lender.loan_because: I am a mother of five, mother inlaw of 5, grandmother to 11, step grandmother to 5, sister, aunt and friend but more importantly, because I care.

lender.name: Petagay
lender.loan_because: I may not be as wealthy as a movie star or basketball player, but I can do my part to help someone who might not have it, as good as i do.Every little bit helps, and if everyone would give a hand to someone in need then we'd all share the wealth of giving and caring.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy teaching children and educating them about the world.

lender.name: katie
lender.occupation: full-time student, part time preeschool teacher

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and want to help others reach their dreams.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Just lighting a little candle.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired journalist

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: i want to
lender.occupational_info: busy

lender.name: Vaughan
lender.loan_because: it allows others to have an opportunity to create a sustainable future for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Vaughan is the founder of a chain of eco-friendly organic restaurants called www.PizzaFusion.com

lender.name: Rhea
lender.loan_because: I want to help others from economically challenged areas of the world realize their dreams and their childrens dreams...everyone should have a chance to make a difference in their lives!

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: We have been so blessed where we live and with all we have received, it is a privilage to help others through this organization.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I pick up coins dropped on the street and also save my loose change so I can donate it at the end of the year. This year I found $25 on the street and saved an additional $225 in spare change. Doing this is painless for me and I hope can make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: Primarily, I want to help someone better their life. Making a difference in someone's life is very important to me. My mother always said, "give of yourself and you'll always get something back... ten fold".
lender.occupational_info: Currently I stay at home and raise my three children. But, I also have a PT job at a juvenile detention center two days a week. I am a detention officer (prison guard) who watches over the residents. I have the best of BOTH worlds :)

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: ..."Life's most persistent and urgent question is: what are you doing for others?" -- Martin Luther King Jr.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: It's a tiny step towards counteracting American foreign policy.

lender.name: Gladys
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people achieve their goals.

lender.name: Ed Oakley
lender.loan_because: I'm very excited about this approach to making a difference in small ways around the world. I cannot think of many better and more fulfilling ways to invest some discretionary funds.
lender.occupational_info: We help managers and owners learn how to work more effectively with all the people associated with their business. We help them optimize the work environment so people WANT to work with them and for them.

lender.name: Judy
lender.occupation: I currently coach diving at Kent School in CT
lender.loan_because: This is what it means to be a citizen of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with high school students teaching them a sport. I also work with people who are at risk for a heart attack. I teach them how to exercise for their health.

lender.name: Shonna
lender.loan_because: I have everything I could ever possibly need and want for nothing. Of course I still want things, but I live like royalty in comparison to the majority of the world's population. I love the idea of being able to give a hand up which helps someone I've never met build a future for themselves and their family.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed, a small loan will help people help themselves to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: truck driver

lender.name: Lionel & Rose
lender.loan_because: We all deserve an opportunity to make the best of our lives. If helping in this way helps create that opportunity we are delighted to be a part of this wonderful group of generous lenders to entrepreneurs world-wide.

lender.name: Raja
lender.loan_because: To encourage honest persons to forever remain honest.
lender.occupational_info: interesting

lender.name: ANGELA
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language (ESL) to immigrants in the USA. I believe that this will help the person become a more productive member of our society, achieve success, and ultimately improve the quality of his or her life. It's all about enabling people to help themselves.

lender.name: Menno
lender.loan_because: I think this is a direct way to make a difference to people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a software engineer at the Maritime Research Institute Netherlands.

lender.name: vicki
lender.loan_because: helping people help themselves is good medicine......
lender.occupational_info: simply the right thing to do!

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: The Golden Rule

lender.name: Alvaro
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help sometimes and motivated people are destined to reach their goals with such support.
lender.occupational_info: Internet entrepreneur.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Jody, Becky, Ruby
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org-what a great way to bring people together. After traveling in SE Asia, we witnessed the power of people using their skills to support their families. We are happy to be a part of this experience.

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: we are all members of one family living in one world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students about child growth and development. As Ghandi so eloquently said, "If we are to teach real peace in this world, and if we are to carry on a real war against war, we shall have to begin with the children."

lender.name: Suzy & Gary
lender.loan_because: Sharing what you have with others is what our lives should be all about. It just feels good to help someone else and see him/her prosper.
lender.occupational_info: Even though we are retired educators, we still feel the need to give back to those in need to help fulfill our lives. One of us is a substitute teacher and the other helps neighbors and friends.

lender.name: Allison and Grant
lender.loan_because: I am excited to be able to help people around the world improved their lives.

lender.name: Stemerdink family Zeist
lender.loan_because: we want to give others a chance to improve their lives

lender.name: cheikh ahmed tidiane
lender.loan_because: I want to raise chickens and sheeps on my father piece of land. We are 10 children and no work available. I need 1200$ to be able to buy the animals.This way we insure that we have something to eat and by selling the animals , we reimburse the loan and make anough profits to continue raising animals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sheet metal worker but there is no job. I worked for 2 years in a cyber coffee that closed. I live from place to place. Not a penny in my pocket.Need to get money in order to help my father with the big family of 10 children.Raising chickens and sheps means having something to eat every day. Thank you all.

lender.name: Gabriel & Racquel
lender.loan_because: reaching out to those in need makes us feel we have done something positive. Helping and caring for others is what life is all about.

lender.name: Adrian N.
lender.loan_because:
I want to see people fulfill there Dreams "We are all God's people"
God Bless "US" all!
lender.occupational_info: Challenging

lender.name: Ebony
lender.loan_because: I really belive it can make a difference and it makes me feel better about the ridiculously indulgent society we live in
lender.occupational_info: I look after people who are physically unable to do so themselves.

lender.name: In memory of Felix
lender.loan_because: In sharing my father's love, I hope to give others the opportunity to fulfill their dreams.

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: It makes the world feel smaller.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Painter, jeweler, and writer

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: As a citizen of the world, I am obligated to try to help others. I want to help make a better world for all.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Its exciting to help someone succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a health clinic for low income people from many different countries.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in a developing country become self suffecient and succesfull in their field.
lender.occupational_info: I Build houses.

lender.name: Martine
lender.loan_because: I find the Kiva initiative ingenious. I like the concept of relending money as soon as it becomes available in my account, and that I can help some small entrepreneurs support themselves and their family and build a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I was a stay -at -home mom. My children are all grown up now.

lender.name: Maribel Moreno
lender.occupation: Asst Center Mgr - Forest Service Dispatch Office
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so much that I get pleasure out of helping others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Assistant Manager of a dispatch center in Porterville CA. I dispatch federal emergency personnel to all risk incidents.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have my health and the ability to make a good living. Now that my children are raised, I want to share with others and help make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Intensive Care Unit in a large hospital in Northern California as a registered nurse.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in so many ways. My philosophy has always been, "The more you give, the more you shall receive." The gift is in the GIVING for me! I have asked my relatives to donate to KIVA instead of buying me Xmas gifts this year!
lender.occupational_info: My husband & I buy single family houses and rent them to provide high quality, safe & secure housing for people who cannot afford to buy their own homes.

lender.name: Randi
lender.loan_because: We (Tom Jordan and I), want to support others in having a business that sustains and supports them and their families. We find it's essential to help others and Kiva has inspired us.
lender.occupational_info: I enable people (infants, children and adults) to live healthier and more productive lives with the techniques and excercises and support. Less pain, better function, better feeling.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I perform testing to diagnose disease.

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because:
I want to believe that we can all make a difference.
Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, you'll find one at the end of your arm... As you grow older you will discover that you have two hands. One for helping yourself, the other for helping others.
Audrey Hepburn
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of two and my husband traines race horses.We live in Ont. Canada

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to invest in people who may live in difficult circumstances but are working hard to improve their lives.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Then the King will reply, 'Truly, I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers or sisters of mine, you did for me.' Matthew 25:40
lender.occupational_info: Mother of two daughters, grandma of 5 pretty amazing grandsons...not done living yet.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: In 1996 a local banker listened to our ideas and dreams and helped us get started.
lender.occupational_info: Cafe owner/operator.

lender.name: Ivy and Craig
lender.loan_because: my mother taught me the meaning and value of working hard. I am so fortunate for having the opportunity to pursue my career, everyone deserves a chance!

lender.name: Monique
lender.occupation: Mid-life career change into food and gardening
lender.loan_because: We need to help others when we can! These loans help others to have a better quality of life. Life is short. Some folks need a loan to become self sufficient- I applaud their courage and determination to better their situation. These loans are paid back to me 100%- I will just turn it around to help another. I believe when you receive you must give back, the universe requires balance.
lender.occupational_info: I am now going through a midlife career change to something I enjoy more (food is fun and everyone needs to eat!) I have also started my own small gardening business.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life with opportunities in education and work. I am very excited about the concept of microfinance and am looking for ways to work with other female entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I have a strategic marketing consulting firm that helps companies position, market and sell their products and services to their customers.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: A lot of people helped me along the way. I like to help others.

lender.name: selina
lender.loan_because: I want to help others reach their full potential. I want to see their dreams become a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I manager commerical and residental properties. I am also a fire safety/life safety inspections co ordinator.

lender.name: Mo.
lender.loan_because: I make a difference everyday in the lives of my children. Following the example of my Grandmother, I would like to make a bigger difference to others during my life.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help folks help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and volunteer with Habitat for Humanity building houses and the American Red Cross for Disaster Relief.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I can afford to help those less fortunate then mee, thank God!
lender.occupational_info: I study to become an interpreter, so that I can help people communicate.

lender.name: Jenn & Jeff
lender.loan_because: We loan to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Chris & Michael
lender.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: THE GOLDEN RULE

lender.name: Trygve
lender.loan_because: 25 dollars buys a lot more in other parts of the globe.
lender.occupational_info: Neuroscience research

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: even in small ways I feel like I can help in a big way.

lender.name: Adam Stepanovic
lender.loan_because: A little capital can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: Work for global small business and organizations

lender.name: Margarida
lender.loan_because: We could make the difference...

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I have $25, others don't
lender.occupational_info: medical student

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: There was a time when I too needed a helping hand and hoped for just one person who would believe in me
lender.occupational_info: I help large businesses perform more efficiently and effectively, but I am also an artist.

lender.name: Fataneh & Majid
lender.loan_because: I loan because it feels wonderful. I am lucky to be healthy and have a wonderful life. And besides, I believe that when we give, it comes back to us tenfolds.
lender.occupational_info: My husband, being a businessman, keeps me busy with his work load and I enjoy helping him stay on top of things.

lender.name: Mike & Sarah
lender.loan_because: We believe that you and I as participants in our communities are responsible for, and accountable to those communities.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: It's not my money
lender.occupational_info: John 21:3

lender.name: Carmen & Glenn
lender.loan_because: Lots of people + a little $ = Kiva LOVE
lender.occupational_info: Carmen works with the elderly and Glenn manages the golf course.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: A peaceful world can only become a reality when all of us help others less fortunate then ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in locating a home for their family.

lender.name: Juan F. Arias
lender.loan_because: I think this is a neat way to use technology to help people around the world help themselves.

lender.name: Ladysmith Rotary Club
lender.occupational_info: Distribution of Charitable Funds

lender.name: Klaus
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: With just a little assistance our Kiva partners do amazing things. I love being part of that. I cheer on each recipient and am proud of their accomplishments.
lender.occupational_info: I help international students to understand U.S. visa regulations and American culture so they can successfully complete an academic degree at my university.

lender.name: John & Rebecca
lender.loan_because: We have needed loans before and we know how imortant it is to have money when it is needed.
lender.occupational_info: We own and operate a used car company where we offer used vehicles for sale

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves and pay back the help I received when I started my own business.
lender.occupational_info: I am bookkeeper/accountant for various small businesses.

lender.name: phyllis
lender.loan_because: I have enough clothes and I like to give.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Home Care Nurse who takes care of disabled children.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want to give back because I have been so greatly blessed
lender.occupational_info: I run a rental office for apartments my husband and I own.
